Sidebar {.sidebar}
=====================================

```{r}
actionButton("add", "Add")
```

```{r}
values = reactiveValues()
values$counter = 0
values$data = data.frame(x=numeric(), y=numeric())

observeEvent(input$add, { 
    values$counter = values$counter + 1
    values$data = rbind(values$data, 
                        data.frame(x=runif(1, min=0, max=1),
                                   y=runif(1, min=0, max=1)))
})

output$data = renderDataTable({values$data})
```

```{r}
fluidRow(column(dataTableOutput("data"), width=1))
```
